name: Buck, Appellant, v. Industrial Valley Bank and Trust Company

judges: Eagen, O’Beien, Pomeeoy, Nix and Mandeeino, JJ.

parties: Buck, Appellant, v. Industrial Valley Bank and Trust Company.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
Mr. Justice Roberts took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Dervtús R. Suplee, with him Sehnader, Harrison, Se-gal amd Lewis, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Buck, Appellant, v. Industrial Valley Bank and Trust Company.
Argued November 10, 1972.
Before Jones, C. J.,
Eagen, O’Beien, Pomeeoy, Nix and Mandeeino, JJ.
William Brodsky, for appellant.
Dervtús R. Suplee, with him Sehnader, Harrison, Se-gal amd Lewis, for appellees.
October 3, 1973:
